sn12.37:4.2: “* Nāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyo tumhākaṃ napi aññesaṃ.
sn12.37:4.3: Purāṇamidaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ vedaniyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn12.37:5.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12.37:5.2: ‘iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati;
sn12.37:5.3: imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati, yadidaṃ—
